Detailed Description

Header file for chunk based memory management, as implemented in Common/ChunksManager.c.

Copyright (2005) Â© Amdocs, All Rights Reserved

This software is distributed on an "AS IS" basis, WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND either expresses or implied.

Id
ChunksManager.h,v 1.10 2005/01/30 15:41:24 guyg Exp

The file contains definitions of functions and structures for the chunk based memory management of IPDR. ...

Typedef Documentation

typedef struct IPDR_tag_BufferHandle BufferHandle
 

handle to a buffer within a chunk (contains a pointer to the actual data as well as to the chunk header.

typedef struct IPDR_tag_ChunkHeader ChunkHeader
 

header placed before each chunks data.

typedef struct IPDR_tag_ChunksManager ChunksManager
 

structure containing information about a chunks manager (includes a link of used chunks, free chunks, and the total amount of memory used by the manager.

IPDR_Status ChunksManager_ReleaseBuffer (  BufferHandle *  BH,
size_t  BufferSize
) 
 

Free a buffer of a given size (in order to have any effect, the buffer has to be the first or the last buffer in a chunk)

Parameters:
BH handle to the buffer to release
BufferSize buffer size
Returns:
IPDR_OK on success; IPDR_STATUS_RETURN_CODE otherwise.

BH handle to the message to release
Returns:
IPDR_OK on success; IPDR_STATUS_RETURN_CODE otherwise.
